oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bus Barn on 4th Avenue North, c.1949
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of the bus station, located on 4th Avenue North, within the Capitol Hill redevelopment area, c.1949. Photographed by the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
